event.title: 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, Los Sauces spans

data.event: According to the 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, Los Sauces spans an area of 849.8 km2 (328 sq mi) and has 7,581 inhabitants (3,847 men and 3,734 women).
Between the 1992 and 2002 censuses, the population fell by 15.7% (1,414 persons).

event.title: is directly elected every four years

data.event: As a commune, Los Sauces is a third-level administrative division of Chile administered by a municipal council, headed by an alcalde who is directly elected every four years.
